Actions.Name: Mail
Actions.Tooltip: Shows number of mails in your inbox with a preview of the latest mail.

Actions.Name: Calendar
Actions.Tooltip: Shows number of events for today with a preview of the next event.

Author: Hi Def Tek
Description: This plugin allows you to view calendar and email notifications for Mircrosoft 365 Work accounts on the streamdeck dashboard. It also facilitates quick access to the outlook websites for calendar and mail directly from the streamdeck. Based on code by Marcells Spies which is available here: https://github.com/marcells/streamdeck-microsoft365.
Name: Microsoft 365 for work accounts
